gold.user: As a developer, I want to retrieve the list of dynamic modules registered in my Jira Cloud application so that I can manage their configurations.
gold.ideal: The response should include a JSON array of dynamic modules with their respective details such as id, name, and type.

gold.user: As a plugin developer, I need to register new dynamic modules to enhance the functionality of my Jira application.
gold.ideal: The request should accept a JSON payload with module details and return a success message with the module id upon successful registration.

gold.user: As an administrator, I want to remove a specific dynamic module from my Jira application to declutter the interface.
gold.ideal: The request should specify the module id to be deleted and return a confirmation message indicating successful removal.
